branchCategory.name: 25A-LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Step Motor/ Servo Motor, Secondary Battery
branchCategory.description: The 25A- series variations are compatible with secondary battery manufacturing for electronics, automotive, and other vehicle types.  Design goals include eliminating copper (Cu) and zinc (Zn) materials where possible, and employing a low dew point grease that retains lubricity even in low manufacturing termpertures.  Please note the copper and zinc materials are used for the motors, cables, controllers and drivers.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Same features and performance as standard LEFS <LI>Stainless steel bolts for construction <LI>Low dew point grease functional down to -70°C <LI>Copper and zinc free except for motor, cables and controller <LI>Non-standard materials for compatibility with secondary/rechargeable battery manufacturing </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: 25A-LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Step Motor/ Servo Motor, Secondary Battery

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEF Series
